name: deformation
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
the action of spoiling the usual and true shape of something, or a change in its usual and true shape: The deformation of the bones was caused by poor diet. She had an accident which caused a slight deformation of her foot. See
deform
More examplesFewer examplesThe nerve pain is caused by connective tissue deformation.During earthquakes, ground deformation can cause critically important pipelines to collapse.Deformation of the bones often indicates fracturing.
